statements: SELECT id, item_name, quantity, location, expiration_date FROM emergency_response_center_inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location, expiration_date, id FROM emergency_response_center_inventory;
SELECT location, id, item_name, expiration_date, quantity FROM emergency_response_center_inventory;
SELECT expiration_date, location, quantity, id, item_name FROM emergency_response_center_inventory;
SELECT * FROM emergency_response_center_inventory;
SELECT * FROM emergency_response_center_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT id, item_name, location FROM emergency_response_center_inventory WHERE location LIKE '%Hospital%' ORDER BY location, quantity DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM emergency_response_center_inventory WHERE expiration_date IS NULL
SELECT id, location FROM emergency_response_center_inventory WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 AND location = 'Warehouse'
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM emergency_response_center_inventory WHERE quantity < 5 AND expiration_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
SELECT * FROM emergency_response_center;
SELECT center_id, center_name FROM emergency_response_center ORDER BY center_id DESC;
SELECT center_name, location FROM emergency_response_center WHERE location LIKE '%City';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN emergency_response_center ON inventory.center_id = emergency_response_center.center_id;
SELECT * FROM emergency_response_center;
SELECT center_name, location FROM emergency_response_center WHERE center_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE center_id = 2;
SELECT e.center_name, i.item_name, i.quantity FROM emergency_response_center e JOIN inventory i ON e.center_id = i.center_id;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM inventory;

SELECT center_name, location FROM emergency_centers_inventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, available_quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0;

SELECT center_name, location, contact_person FROM emergency_centers_inventory WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT center_name, location FROM emergency_response_centers;

SELECT equipment_name, condition FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM emergency_response_centers;
SELECT center_name, location FROM emergency_response_centers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE expiration_date > '2022-10-31';
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, condition FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
